# Design Review Checklist

Quick reference for UI/UX reviews.

---

## Workflow
- [ ] Primary task completable in minimum steps
- [ ] Important info visible without scrolling
- [ ] One-hand usable on mobile (thumb zone)
- [ ] No unnecessary navigation

## Visual Hierarchy
- [ ] Primary action stands out
- [ ] Secondary actions are clearly secondary
- [ ] Consistent spacing (8px grid)
- [ ] Adequate whitespace

## Touch & Accessibility
- [ ] Touch targets ≥44px
- [ ] Contrast ratio ≥4.5:1 for text
- [ ] Focus states visible
- [ ] Semantic HTML used

## Feedback States
- [ ] Loading state exists
- [ ] Error state exists
- [ ] Success feedback present
- [ ] Disabled states styled

## Consistency
- [ ] Follows DESIGN_SYSTEM.md
- [ ] Uses design tokens (no hardcoded colors)
- [ ] Matches existing patterns
- [ ] Strings from strings.ts

## Mobile
- [ ] Font size ≥16px for inputs
- [ ] Works in thumb zone
- [ ] Responsive layout tested
- [ ] Safe areas respected
